descriptionHtml:
[center][color=RED][size=+2]The Candles Retexture[/size][/center][/color]

[size=+1]
[center]Simply a retexture of game\'s candles.[/center]

Before

[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot174_zpsf15435e1.jpg[/IMG]


After

[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot173_zps9bd44426.jpg[/IMG]

 [center]-- The other candles will be added tomorrow --[/center]

Install: 

[center]just drop \"Textures\" folder into \"Textures\" folder in your Skyrim\\Data.[/center]

[center]If you\'re using anothe mod that modify candles, be sure to install my mod [u][color=RED]AFTER IT[/color][/u].

------------------------

Please leave a comment if you have any suggest, if you like or if you don\'t like something.[/center]

[center]If you like it, you can also try my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30173]Necromancer Amulet Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32561]Bones and Skeletons Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32396]The Cultists Robes Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32449]The Miraak Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31731]The Divine Amulets Retexture[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32182]The Divine Shrines Retexture[/url].[/center]


[center][color=RED][size=+1]It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.[/size][/color][/center]


[size=+1][center]Andrea[/center][/size]
author: Andre7890
